description.ko: 거대한 강철 건물과 빛나는 광고가 비에 젖은 도시의 지평선을 장식하는, 첨단 기술과 거친 삶이 공존하는 미래의 모습을 담고 있습니다.
description.en: A deep dive into a high-tech, low-life future where towering steel giants and glowing advertisements define the horizon of a rain-soaked city.

prompt: A sprawling cyberpunk metropolis at night during a heavy rainfall, neon signs in vibrant pink and cyan reflecting on wet asphalt streets, towering skyscrapers with massive holographic advertisements, flying vehicles weaving through urban canyons, cinematic lighting, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, futuristic aesthetic.
